        Get days between two selected dates
        Parameters:
        simpleDateFormat - Selected date format for input dates
        startDate - Start date in String following date format selected
        endDate - End date in String following date format selected
        timeUnit - Time unit in that the method return response
        Returns:
        Number of days between two dates
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if something was wrong with dates
